title: One of my accounts are gone CANT LOG IN!!!!!!!!
body: I went to sign into my account which is user name CombrigDsykes and it says my email doesn't exist and my password is wrong WTF!!!! all my stuff is like gone right now i need help riot

replies.body: I went ahead and looked over the account you mentioned and it does look like something suspicious was going on. Someone might have been able to sign into your account without you knowing and get the password and email changed. Reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as soon as you can and they'll be able to help out after verifying that you created the account!
